ticket.title: Failure of the Update
ticket.original-body:
Good afternoon,
I wanted to Update the Programm Rubygem from 1.2.0 on newest version according to updates - system ERROR: While executing according to (RuntimeError) according to updates - system is disabled on Debian. RubyGems can be updated using the official Debian repositories by aptitude or apt-get. but debian is blocked and by apitude is 1.2.0 the newst version
I hope on a quick answer, with friendly greetings Raymond Grent
